item.title: Lisa add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I am coming to terms with the fact that loving someone requires a leap of faith, and that a soft landing is never guaranteed." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "There are no safe choices. Only other choices." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Lynne Ewing
item.description: "Daimonds are a girls best friend- they're sharper than knives" -- Lynne Ewing

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "You can never really know someone completely. That’s why it’s the most terrifying thing in the world, really—taking someone on faith, hoping they’ll take you on faith too. It’s such a precarious balance, It’s a wonder we do it at all. And yet.." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "Corrupt my brother, will you? I'll see you in hell first, sir." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "The key holds the truth" -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "How can my ankles and arms be obscene?" -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "I am no longer content to be the scared, obedient schoolgirl. Who are you, a stranger, to tell me what I can and cannot do?" -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "Eve didn't choose to eat the apple. She was tempted by the serpent." "Yes," I argue, thoughts coming out half-formed. "But...she didn't have to take a bite. She chose to." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Second star to the right and straight on 'til morning. " -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
Lisa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Wendy," Peter Pan continued in a voice that no woman has ever yet been able to resist, "Wendy, one girl is more use than twenty boys." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "When a new baby laughs for the first time a new fairy is born, and as there are always new babies there are always new fairies." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "Love stories are written in millimeters and milliseconds with a fast, dull pencil whose marks you can barely see, they are written in miles and eons with a chisel on the side of a mountiantop" -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "You forget all of it anyway. . . You forget who was cool and who was not, who was pretty, smart, athletic, and not. . . You forget all of them. Even the ones you said you loved, and even the ones you actually did. They’re the last to go. And then once you’ve forgotten enough, you love someone else." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Unrequited love is all right in books and things, but in real life, it completely sucks" -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "O Romeo, Romeo, wherefore art thou Romeo? Deny thy father refuse thy name, thou art thyself thou not a montegue, what is montegue? tis nor hand nor foot nor any other part belonging to a man What is in a name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet, So Romeo would were he not Romeo called retain such dear perfection to which he owes without that title, Romeo, Doth thy name! And for that name which is no part of thee, take all thyself." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Lord, what fools these mortals be!" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "thus with a kiss I die" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The first thing we do, let's kill all the lawyers." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "By the pricking of my thumbs, Something wicked this way comes." -- William Shakespeare
